choices.A: Change from a JDBC call to a HTTP call to retrieve data faster
choices.D: Verify if the Docker container running MySQL is limiting CPU utilization
choices.C: Explore the JDBC queries looking for optimization opportunities
choices.B: Run the AccountProfileMySQL service in Kubernetes

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
I think it's C
Wondering should A. & C. be more suitable, as Java HotSpot seems aim at improving performance instead of risk...

choices.C: Validate the content of the name and address parameters
choices.A: Reject string values that are greater than maximum size
choices.E: Compile the application using Java HotSpot
choices.B: Use floating point instead of integer for rating to avoid overflow
choices.D: Run the application in a Docker container

questions.question_text: As a department starts following NetDevOps principles, how should the network monitoring strategy be updated to provide more visibility into the user experience?

choices.C: Identify and capture the key performance indicators that describe the state of the network
choices.B: Update tools to pull or stream monitoring metrics from APIs instead of using legacy protocols
choices.A: Leverage machine learning tools to more quickly identify problems m syslog and SNMP data
choices.D: Identify and fix network issues faster by leveraging streaming telemetry from network devices

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
D also mentions an action to do, but for the question it's irrelevant.

questions.question_text: What is a benefit of monitoring the CI/CD pipeline?

choices.C: analyzes network outages that affect the network and server infrastructure
choices.B: proactively deploys new servers if needed
choices.D: provides insight into how efficiently the development team is operating

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D seems to be the best answer.

questions.question_text: What is a benefit of Infrastructure as Code for the cloud?

choices.A: It groups system downtime across the infrastructure
choices.B: It enables the user to automate deployments
choices.D: It is a cost effective solution for services
